title: Wavelength-Division Ternary Optical Computer
description: Open source research project for building a ternary (base-3) optical computer using wavelength-division multiplexing. Includes hardware designs, simulations, firmware, and documentation.
notes: This software implements the architecture described in the paper 'Wavelength-Division Ternary Logic: Bypassing the Radix Economy Penalty in Optical Computing' (DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.18437600). All hardware designs, code, and documentation are open source under MIT/CC BY 4.0/CERN OHL licenses.
